comment: More information to come. Local 's arcade tournaments will begin tomorrow morning. Some will be original arcade coin-ops and others will be MAME systems using Raspberry Pi computers. Looking to buy Reagan/Bush campaign prints to help set the 's mood and to honor a great president. Trying to get a live webcam set up for tomorrow if possible.
amr:
# ::snt More information to come. Local 's arcade tournaments will begin tomorrow morning. Some will be original arcade coin-ops and others will be MAME systems using Raspberry Pi computers. Looking to buy Reagan/Bush campaign prints to help set the 's mood and to honor a great president. Trying to get a live webcam set up for tomorrow if possible.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / information
            :mod (m2 / more)
            :ARG1-of (c / come-01))
      :snt2 (b / begin-01
            :ARG1 (t / tournament
                  :mod (a / arcade)
                  :poss (l / local))
            :time (t2 / tomorrow)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (m3 / morning)
                  :mod (t3 / tomorrow)))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op1 (c2 / coin-ops
                  :mod (o / original)
                  :mod (a3 / arcade)
                  :domain (s / some))
            :op2 (s2 / system
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01)
                  :domain (o2 / other)
                  :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / computer
                              :mod (p / product
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Raspberry"
                                          :op2 "Pi")))))
            :snt4 (l2 / look-04
                  :ARG1 (b2 / buy-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / print
                              :mod (c4 / campaign-01
                                    :ARG0 (s4 / slash
                                          :op1 (p3 / person
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Reagan"))
                                          :op2 (p4 / person
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Bush")))))
                        :purpose (a4 / and
                              :op1 (h / help-01
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 (s5 / set-up-03
                                          :ARG1 (m4 / mood
                                                :poss (p5 / person
                                                      :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                            :ARG2 (p6 / president))
                                                      :mod (g / great)))))
                              :op2 (h3 / honor-01
                                    :ARG0 p2
                                    :ARG1 p5))))
            :snt5 (t4 / try-01
                  :ARG1 (g2 / get-04
                        :ARG1 s5
                        :ARG1 (w / webcam
                              :mod (l3 / live))
                        :time (t5 / tomorrow))
                  :condition (p7 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 s5))))
